prefix.help: Changes the prefix used for the current server.

8ball.help: Has the bot answer a Yes/No question.

pirate.help: Makes the bot speak like a pirate.

ping.help: Used to test connectivity to the bot though a simple call response.

invite.help: Sends a shortened invite link for adding the bot to a server.

help.help: Prints the help for a command, for a list of commands use 'commands'.

info.help: Prints the info documentation about this bot.

roll.help: Rolls a die/dice, accepts multiple inputs.

avatar.help: Makes the bot post a high resolution version of its avatar.

ids.help: Makes bot send a message with the user's id and the current channel id.

math.help: Makes bot evaluate a math expression.

status.help: Makes bot report the status of a specific user and when they were last online-line.

commands.help: Makes the bot DM the user the list of supported commands.

poke.help: Makes bot DM a user the channel and user that issued the command. E.G.: poke @username.

stats.help: Makes bot print out current tracked stats for a given user.

ignore.help: Makes bot ignore all commands and logging on a channel, to un-ignore a channel do: ignore remove.

yt.help: Makes the bot search YouTube for a video, user, or play-list.

xkcd.help: Makes the bot post a random xkcd comic or search for a specific comic using keyword(s).

announce.help: Makes a bot announce user changes on a channel, issue command again to turn off. Can only be enabled in one channel.

cat.help: Makes bot post a random cat picture.

snake.help: Makes bot post a random snake picture.

pug.help: Makes bot post a random pug picture.

redditscenery.help: Makes bot post a random picture from a list, to see the list issue : redditscenery list.

js.help: Bot owner only! Runs raw JavaScript and is potentially harmful to the bot.

verb.help: Bot owner only! Disallows message and status output to console.

uptime.help: Makes the bot post its current uptime.

shorten.help: Makes the bot post a shorten version of a really long URL.

word.help: Makes the bot post the definition of a word or the word of the day if no word is given.

prune.help: Deletes a specified number of messages in the current channel.

info: This bot has been coded by seth177 it is designed to be a simple chat bot combining useful commands I've seen across a few bots but never really unified together in a way I really wanted. To see a list of commands do the issue 'commands', if you need help on what a command does issue 'help <command name>' for documentation.
